newsitem.title: BULGARIA: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

BULGARIA, July 14 - Varna - East - 2 Vessels loading at berth, 2 waiting at anchorage to load. West - 12 Vessels loading at berth, 1 discharging at berth, 2 waiting at anchorage to load. Bourgas - East - 12 Vessels due, 5 loading at berth, 3 discharging at berth, 6 waiting at anchorage to load. West - 3 Vessels loading at berth. Tankers - 1 Tanker loading at berth. Bourgas - Eight vessels operating of which 6 loading, 2 general, 2 steel, 1 baryte, 1 metal. 2 Discharging, 1 sugar, 1 zinc copper. 4 Vessels waiting in roads for loading, 1 cars, 2 tankers, 1 general. 8 Vessels due of which 4 to load, 1 steel, 1 fertiliser, 1 metal, 1 copper anodes. 3 To discharge, 1 zinc concentrates/fishmeal1 coal, 1 iron ore, 1 passenger vessel.

Varna - 38 Vessels operating of which 26 loading, 2 glass, 2 clinker, 1 tsp, 8 soda, 3 urea, 1 kaoline, 1 cans, 1 cellulose, 1 wooden materials, 1 quarts sand, 1 sas, 1 quarts sand/soda, 1 paper, 1 plywood, 1 edc. 4 Discharging, 1 wheat, 2 phosphorite, 1 soya fodder. 1 Discharging/loading general/scrap. 7 Discharging loading, 2 trucks/containers, 5 containers. 8 Vessels waiting in roads of which 3 to load, 1 glass, 1 general, 1 plywood, 5 cargo not nominated.

CROATIA, July 14 - Rijeka - Two vessels discharging at berth, 3 loading at berth, 4 anchored, 6 due. 11 Vessels under repair/drydock. Zadar - Three vessels under repair/drydock. Sibenik - One vessel under repair/drydock. Split - One vessel under repair/drydock. Ploce - One vessel discharging at berth. Pula, Rasa, Dubrovnik - No vessels.

CYPRUS, July 15 - Limassol - Vessels due 16/7, 4 container vessels, 2 conventional vessels, 2 ro-ro, 5 passenger vessels. No delays expected. 6 Container vessels discharging/loading at berth, 2 conventional vessels discharging at berth. Larnaca - Vessels due 16/7, 2 container vessels, 1 conventional vessel. No delays expected. 3 Container vessels discharging/loading at berth, 1 conventional vessel discharging at berth.

ESTONIA, July 15 - Tallinn - City port - 4 Vessels due, 1 vessel loading steel billets at berth, 1 liner vessel. Kopli - 5 Vessels due, 3 loading at berth of which 1 general cargo, 1 fertiliser, 1 sawn timber. Parnu - 1 Vessel due, 5 loading at berth of which 3 timber, 2 peat moss. Muuga - 16 Vessels due. 3 Fuel oil loading at berth. Discharging at berth, 1 sugar, 1 container vessel, 1 cocoa beans.

ITALY, July 15 - Naples - Two vessels of which 1 container, 1 general cargo. Gaeta, Salerno - No vessels in roads. Genoa commercial port - No vessels in roads, no delays. 22 Vessels berthed, 1 in drydock. Multedo oil harbour, Civitavecchia, Gaeta, Salerno, Palermo, Ancona/Falconara, Venice - No vessels in roads, no delays. Savona - One vessel in roads, no delays, 2 vessels berthed. Vado Ligure - No vessels in roads, no delays, 3 vessels berthed. La Spezia - No vessels in roads, no delays, 4 vessels berthed. Leghorn - Two vessels in roads, 12 berthed. Naples - One vessel in roads, no delays. Augusta oil harbour - One vessel in roads, 4 berthed. Syracuse oil harbour - No vessels in roads, 1 berthed. Sarroch - Five vessels in roads, 7 berthed. Taranto - No vessels in roads, 3 berthed, no delays. Ravenna - No delays. Trieste - Commercial port - No vessels in roads, no delays. Siot oil terminal - 2 Vessels berthed, 1 vessel in roads, no delays.

LATVIA, July 15 - Riga - 18 Vessels operating of which 4 timber loaders, 1 container loader, 2 tanker loaders, 2 steel loaders, 1 fertiliser loader, 2 frozen food dischargers, 2 awaiting operations, 2 sugar dischargers, 2 other general cargo. No delays, 18 vessels due. Ventspils - Six vessels operating of which 2 steel loaders, 1 mop loader, 2 miscellaneous, 1 ferrous loader. 6 Vessels awaiting operations, no delays, 10 vessels due.

LITHUANIA, July 14 - Klaipeda - Vessels loading, 2 fertiliser, 1 oil, 2 metal, 1 scrap, 1 preparations. Discharging, 4 fish, 1 sugar, 1 soya pellets, 1 bananas. 1 Vessel loading/discharging, 1 in roads, 28 due.

RUSSIA, July 14 - BALTIC PORTS - St. Petersburg - 23 Vessels operating of which loading, 3 non-ferrous, 4 general cargo, 8 fertiliser, 1 container vessel, 1 paper. Discharging, 2 frozen chicken, 2 containers, 2 fertiliser. 8 Vessels awaiting operations, 16 due. July 15 - Kaliningrad - 14 Vessels operating, no delays, 6 vessels due. Vyborg - Two vessels operating, no delays, 5 vessels due. Kaliningrad - Commercial sea port - 9 Vessels operating of which 8 loading (1 non-ferrous metal, 1 ferro alloys, 1 fertiliser, 1 coke, 1 coal, 1 ore, 2 steel scrap). 1 Discharging/loading cars, 3 vessels waiting, 4 due.

NORTHERN BASIN, July 15 - Murmansk - Six vessels operating of which 1 apatite, 1 alumina, 1 steel, 2 non-ferrous metal, 1 cabotage, 1 apatite loader waiting. 6 Vessels due during the week of which 5 loaders (3 apatite, steel scrap, 1 iron pellets), 1 alumina discharger.

BLACK SEA - Novorossiysk - 18 Vessels operating of which 10 loading, 1 cement, 4 steel, 1 scrap, 1 copper, 1 aluminium, 1 coils/pipes, 1 paper. 8 discharging, 4 various, 4 sugar. 18 Vessels waiting in roads of which 8 to load, 3 steel, 1 tin, 1 paper, 1 timber, 1 coal, 1 aluminium. 10 to discharge, 4 bulk sugar, 4 bagged rice, 1 frozen poultry, 1 bulk maize. 29 Vessels due of which 21 to load, 1 cement, 2 scrap, 1 cast iron, 9 steel, 1 aluminium, 3 copper, 3 coal, 1 urea. 5 To discharge, 2 general, 1 soybean oil, 1 water melons, 1 luggage. 3 To discharge/load containers. Oil terminal - 2 Crude oil for loading, 2 waiting in roads, 10 due to load.

POLAND, July 15 - Szczecin - 73 Vessels due, 39 loading at berth, 27 discharging at berth. 2 Waiting at anchorage to load, 1 waiting at anchorage to discharge, 16 under repair. Gdynia - 12 Vessels operating of which 5 loading at berth (2 general cargo, 1 coal, 2 bulk). 6 Discharging at berth (4 general cargo, 1 coal, 1 bulk). 1 Waiting at anchorage to discharge, 9 under repair/drydock, 28 due. Gdansk - Seven vessels operating of which 5 loading at berth (1 bulk, 3 general cargo, 1 tanker). 2 Discharging at berth (1 grain, 1 tanker), 4 vessels under repair/drydock, 15 due.

PORTUGAL, July 14 - Leixoes - Vessels operating, 6 general cargo, 3 container vessels. No vessels awaiting berth. Places vacant, 9 piers with cranes, 2 piers without. Lisbon - 50 Vessels due, 83 in port, 4 loading at berth, 17 unloading at berth, 6 loading and unloading at berth, 3 loading at anchorage, 1 unloading at anchorage, 4 bunkering, 21 under repair/drydock, 4 awaiting orders, 23 miscellaneous craft. July 15 - Setubal - Five vessels loading at berth, 6 discharging at berth, 5 under repair/drydock. Vessels due, 6 for discharging, 3 for loading, 1 for repair/drydock.

ROMANIA, July 14 - Constantza - 30 Vessels operating of which 18 generals loading, 6 bulkers (4 loading, 2 discharging), 2 bagged chemicals loading, 2 bagged cement, 1 tanker discharging, 1 container vessel loading. 5 Vessels waiting in roads of which 3 generals for loading, 2 bulkers for loading/discharging. Constantza Sud (Agigea) - Eight vessels in port of which 7 loading general cargo, 1 bulker loading. Mangalia - One vessel loading general cargo. Midia - Five livestock carriers loading, 1 tanker discharging.

SLOVENIA, July 14 - Koper - Eight vessels berthed of which 2 containers loading/discharging, 2 general cargo loading sawn timber, alcohol, 2 bulk carriers loading coal, quartzite, 2 bulk carriers discharging soya, perlite. 13 Vessels due during next 2 days of which 3 containers to load/discharge, 3 car carriers to load/discharge cars, 5 general cargo to load sawn timber, paper, steel products, 1 ferry to load/discharge, 1 bulk carrier to load coal. No delays expected.

SPAIN, July 15 - Aviles - Eight vessels in port of which 3 loading (1 steel, 1 coke, 1 clinker). 5 Discharging (3 blend, 1 steel, 1 tar). Gijon - Three vessels in port of which 1 loading cement, 2 discharging coal and gas oil. No delays or congestion. Santander - Vessels loading in port, 1 sugar, 1 sodium carbonate, 1 sodium phosphate, 1 wire steel reels, 1 steel pipes. Unloading, 1 wheat, 2 ferro silicon, 1 granite, 1 soya beans. No vessels anchored, no delays expected. Cadiz - 14 Vessels operating of which 3 ro-ro, 1 container, 2 sugar, 1 wheat, 1 charcoal, 1 shipbuilding material, 5 repair. No delays. Sagunto - 24 Vessels operating of which 12 discharging steel products, 3 discharging timber, 2 loading bulk fertiliser, 2 loading cement, 3 ro- ro's discharging/loading general cargo, 1 ro-ro loading general cargo, 1 discharging fresh fruit pallets. No vessels berthed outside commercial wharf, no berthing delays.

TURKEY, July 14 - Istanbul - Haydarpasa - 7 Vessels operating of which 3 containers, 3 dry cargo, 1 ro-ro. No berthing delays. Galata - 8 Cargo/passenger vessels operating. Port congested. Ambarli - 14 Vessels operating, no berthing delays. July 15 - Mersin - 13 Vessels awaiting orders. 11 Operating of which loading, 1 cement clinker, 1 legumes, 1 bulk chrome ore. Discharging, 1 Palm oil, 1 barley. Loading/discharging, 1 vehicles, 5 containers. Free zone piers - 1 Discharging rice/vegetable oil, 1 loading zinc. Seka - No vessels in port.

UKRAINE, July 15 - Mariupol - 16 Vessels loading at berth (fertiliser, metal products, clay, sulphur, coal). 1 Vessel discharging general cargo at berth, 7 waiting at anchorage to load (metal products, sulphur, coal). 3 Vessels waiting at anchorage to discharge (metal products, containers), 4 reloading to sea-going vessels (fertiliser, urea, metal products. 1 Vessel under repair/drydock, 9 floating storehouses (fertiliser, sulphur). 26 Vessels due for loading and discharging (fertiliser, clay, general cargo, alumina/sulphur, urea, coal, metal products, sulphur, ore, containers). Kerch - One vessel loading ore at berth, 1 waiting at anchorage to load metal products. 1 Vessel awaiting orders, 2 under repair/drydock.

Berdiansk - Three vessels loading at berth (fertiliser, metal products, coke). Mariupol - 13 Vessels operating of which 11 loading, 3 fertiliser, 6 steel, 1 pipes/ferrous metals, 1 fire clay. 1 Discharging equipment, 1 discharging/loading containers. 11 Vessels waiting in roads of which 8 to load, 5 steel, 1 fire clay, 1 fertiliser, 1 pipes/ferrous metals/containers. 3 To discharge equipment, urea, steel billets. 29 Vessels due of which 21 to load, 4 fertiliser, 1 wire, 8 steel, 2 coal, 2 wire rods, 4 fire clay. 2 To discharge clay and equipment, 1 to discharge/load alumina/sulphur, 5 to discharge/load containers.

Odessa - 15 Vessels operating of which 9 loading, 2 fertiliser, 5 metals, 1 oil, 1 fuel oil. 2 Discharging sugar and petrol, 3 passenger vessels. 1 Under repair, 5 waiting in roads to load metal. 21 Vessels due of which 14 to load, 12 metals, 1 oil, 1 equipment. 1 To discharge bananas, 3 to discharge/load containers, 3 passenger. Ilyichevsk - 12 Vessels operating of which 10 loading, 8 steel, 1 spirit, 1 potash. 2 Discharging/loading containers, 3 waiting in roads to load potash, to discharge soyabean, to discharge/load containers. 13 Vessels due of which 6 to load, 5 steel, 1 potash. 2 To discharge oil, 5 to discharge/load containers.

YUGOSLAVIA, July 15 - Bar - Eight vessels berthed of which 1 discharging bananas, 1 discharging gasoline, 2 loading aluminium, 1 loading copper, 1 loading metal, 1 loading acetic acid, 1 loading steel coils. Zelenika/Bijela - One vessel laid up, 5 under repair.
